whoWeAre.text1: StellarVest Asset Management was created with the goal of maximizing asset value, providing our clients with an integrated and efficient approach. Our experience and skills range from analysis and strategic thinking to asset development, sales, and after-sales.
whoWeAre.text2: We manage assets from A to Z, with a mindset focused on maximizing asset appreciation.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.text1: Using an approach of End to End process of NPL (Non-Performing Loan) and Real Estate Owned (REO) Management that provides a 360º service, with cross-functional coordination where finance, compliance, marketing, and legal teams play an essential role throughout the process, in order to ensure efficiency, risk management, and maximum value recovery.
approach.text2: Our approach consist of five main stages, with specific tasks aligned to different business functions: Loans (loan assessments, pre-ACU claims, collateral valuations), REO Conversion (regularization strategy, documental and technical regularization, sale strategy definition), Asset Clean-Up & REO Management (development, brokers selection, pricing definition, REO valuations, marketing, property management, compliance and financial monitoring), Publication & Sale (asset publication and promotion, pricing, commercial offers, proposal management, break-in and rentals management), and Closing (deeds and promissory management, post-sale document management).

securitization.title: Securitization Vehicle
securitization.subtitle: Zarco STC at StellarVest
securitization.intro: Zarco STC, SA was established with the objective of creating added value for our Clients by providing a full range of securitization services, approved by the Portuguese Market Authority (CMVM) with well defined independent organizational structure in contrast with market practice.
securitization.quote: Adding value through independent, specialized securitization services.

whyStellarVest.title: Why Zarco STC?
whyStellarVest.description: Zarco STC offers distinct advantages in the securitization landscape:
items: Independent vehicle exclusively devoted to securitization with a fully dedicated team
Ensures all processes, procedures and reporting activities related to securitization management are delivered
Fully owned by Stellarvest, a servicing driven Group
Provides undisputed guarantee of independency to every investor who securitizes a portfolio
Ensures all information remains confidential and not shared with competitors
Full segregation of securitization and servicing activities
Works with any servicer chosen by the investor, whether it is Stellarvest or not

approach.title: Our Approach shows
approach.description: Our methodology creates additional value through comprehensive reporting and strategic information management:
items: Reports to the Bank of Portugal - Reports its borrowers and guarantors default status to the Bank of Portugal Credit Bureau ("Central de Responsabilidades") and this information is shared in the financial system, influencing the indebtedness capacity of those debtors

Negotiation and recovery potential - This pressures them to engage in negotiation and proceed with payment, increasing recovery potential. This report is not mandatory for STC, but Zarco is one of the few servicing securitization vehicles who does such report, understanding the significant added value to its Clients and Investors

Provider of financial information - Besides this, as a provider of financial information, Zarco is entitled to also receive the same level of info on its debtors under management, which is crucial for decision making models and tools
